{{Description|You discussed the way to grasp the formless wind with Paimon.}}
'''Palm Vortex''' is [[Traveler (Anemo)]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|2|3.33}}
** Only the final hit of this skill generates Elemental Particles.
* The DMG multiplier of the absorbed element is '''25%''' of the Anemo DMG multiplier.
* When the skill button is held, '''Initial Cutting DMG''' ticks 2 times (at 0.35s and 0.5s), then it switches to '''Max Cutting DMG''', which ticks 4 more times (at 0.85s, 1s, 1.35s and 1.5s).
* When the skill button is pressed, it will immediately trigger '''Initial Storm DMG'''.
* [[Elemental Absorption]] can occur from both elements on the target as well as elements afflicting the Traveler.
* Unlike other Talents with Elemental Absorption, Anemo Traveler's absorption priority is {{Cryo}} / {{Color|Cryo|Frozen}} > {{Pyro}} > {{Hydro}} > {{Electro}}.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|character=Traveler (Anemo)|talent=Palm Vortex|ascension|2|Second Wind}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|1|Raging Vortex}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Cherishing Breezes}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Vortex Stellaris}}
